name: TheBabylonBeePrayer
0:
”Alexa, open The Babylon Bee Prayer”
”Alexa, start The Babylon Bee Prayer”
”Alexa, launch The Babylon Bee Prayer”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the babylon bee prayer
des: Ever wanted Alexa to say grace before dinner? Here's a word-for-word transcription of the prayer referenced in the https://babylonbee.com/news/alexa-offers-to-lead-family-prayer-after-no-one-else-volunteers/ article on the satirical website Babylon Bee.
